metadata.name: Fire in the Sky
metadata.description:
At the very end, we watched the falling sunset. Not a word was spoken.

--------
GASHO's 2.5D artwork (XS size) will be included with the purchase of NFT.
The artwork will be mailed to you usually 1.5 to 2 months after NFT purchase.

NFTを購入された方には、GASHOの2.5Dアート(XSサイズ)作品が付属します。
作品はNFT購入後、通常1.5～2ヶ月後に郵送致します。

■For inquiries about the GASHO Creators Program, please contact us through our website or the following DM on Twitter.
https://print.gasho2.com/contact/
https://twitter.com/GASHO_2_0
